Address.label: Address
Address.value: 605 LINCOLN ROAD,5TH FLOOR, MIAMI BEACH, Florida, 33139, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Blink Charging Co is an owner, operator, and provider of electric vehicle (EV) charging services. The company offers both residential and commercial EV charging equipment, enabling EV drivers to easily recharge at various location types. Its principal line of products and services are the Blink EV charging network (the Blink Network) and EV charging equipment (also known as electric vehicle supply equipment), and EV-related services.
